tuv.seg: The asylum process in Ireland
An próiseas tearmainn in Éirinn
Overview Document International protection – an overview This document describes the process for seeking international protection in Ireland and services for refugees in Ireland
Overview Document Cosaint idirnáisiúnta - achoimre Cur síos an doiciméad seo ar phróiséas iarrtha ar chosaint idirnáisiúnta in Éirinn agus seirbhísí do dhídeanaithe in Éirinn
Coming to Ireland as an asylum seeker or refugee
Ag teacht go hÉirinn mar iarrthóir tearmainn nó mar dhídeanaí
This document explains some of the terms used in the international protection process: asylum seekers, Convention and Programme refugees, subsidiary protection and permission to remain
Tugtar cur síos ar na hiarrthóirí tearmainn, na dídeanaithe Coinbhinsiúin agus Cláir, agus na ndaoine a fuair cead fanacht in Éirinn
Applying for international protection in Ireland
Ag cur isteach ar stádas dídeanaithe
Rules and processes involved in applying for international protection in Ireland
Tá rialacha agus próisis tábhachtacha éagsúla ann a bhaineann le hiarratas a chur isteach ar stádas dídeanaí in Éirinn
Rights and obligations of asylum seekers in Ireland
Cearta agus oibleagáidí na niarrthóirí tearmainn
People applying for international protection in Ireland have certain legal rights
Tá cearta dlíthiúla áirithe ag iarrthóirí tearmainn agus acu siúd a chuireann iarratas isteach ar dhearbhú dídeanaí in Éirinn
They also have important obligations
Tá oibleagáidí tábhachtacha orthu freisin
Find out about these rights and obligations
Faigh eolas maidir leis na cearta agus na hoibleagáidí seo
If you do not get a declaration as a refugee
Má dhiúltaítear do d'iarratas ar stádas dídeanaí
This document describes the appeals process in the event that you do not get a declaration as a refugee
Tugann an doiciméad seo cur síos ar an bpróiseas achomhairc sa chás go ndiúltófar do d’iarratas ar stádas dídeanaí
Withdrawing from the international protection process
Ag aistarraingt ón bpróiseas tearmainn
This document describes the procedures you should follow if you are withdrawing your application for international protection or your appeal in the event of refusal of international protection
Tugann an doiciméad seo cur síos ar na nósanna imeachta ar chóir duit a leanúint má tá tú chun d’iarratas nó d’achomhrac ar stádas dídeanaí a tharraingt siar sa chás gur diúltaíodh do stádas dídeanaí
The Eurodac system was established by the European Union for the comparison of fingerprints of asylum applicants and illegal immigrants
Bhunaigh an tAontas Eorpach an córas Eurodac chun méarloirg na n-iarrthóirí tearmainn a chur i gcomparáid le méarloirg na n-inimirceach neamhdhleathach
The Dublin III Regulation provides a mechanism for determining which country is responsible for examining an application for international protection
Tugann an doiciméad seo achoimre ar Rialacháin Bhaile Átha Cliath, a sholáthraíonn meicníocht chun socrú na tíre atá freagrach as iarratas ar chosaint idirnáisiúnta a scrúdú
Assessment and examination of applications for international protection in Ireland
Fiosrú na niarratas ag Coimisinéir Iarratais do Dhídeanaithe
An outline of how applications for international protection in Ireland are assessed and examined
Tugtar achoimre ar an bpróiseas agallaimh d’iarrthóirí tearmainn i mbun lorg an stádais dídeanaí in Éirinn
Decisions made by the Minister for Justice and Equality in relation to international protection
Cinntí a dhéanann an tAire Dlí agus Cirt agus Comhionnanais maidir le cosaint idirnáisiúnta

This document describes the role of the Minister for Justice and Equality in the granting of international protection (refugee status or subsidiary protection) and the legal rights of someone granted internation protection

Cuireann an doiciméad seo síos ar ról an Aire Dlí, Cirt agus Comhionnanais i mbronnadh na cosanta idirnáisiúnta (stádas teifigh nó cosaint thánaisteach) agus na cearta dlíthiúla atá ag duine ar a mbronnadh cosaint idirnáisiúnta

Ábhar is mó éilimh i "Ag bogadh tíre"
Irish citizenship through birth or descent
Saoránacht d'Éirinn ó bhreith nó ó ghinealach
Visa requirements for entering Ireland
Riachtanais víosa le teacht isteach in Éirinn
Coming to work in Ireland
Ag teacht go hÉirinn chun oibriú
Becoming an Irish citizen
Ag éirí i do shaoránach Éireannach
